projection_mat = np.array([[-2100.0, -960.0, 0.0, 6720.0], [0.0, -540.0, -
    2100.0, 3780.0], [0.0, -1.0, 0.0, 7.0]])
try:
    np.testing.assert_almost_equal(self.cam.get_3x4_P_projection_matrix(),
        projection_mat)
    res = True
except AssertionError as err:
    res = False
    print(err)
self.assertTrue(res)
